title._content: Image taken from page 169 of 'Corona and Coronet. Being a narrative of the Amherst Eclipse expedition to Japan, in Mr. James's schooner-yacht Coronet, to observe the sun's total obscuration, 9th August, 1896'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Corona and Coronet. Being a narrative of the Amherst Eclipse expedition to Japan, in Mr. James's schooner-yacht Coronet, to observe the sun's total obscuration, 9th August, 1896" Author: TODD, Mabel Loomis. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10057.cc.37." Page: 169 Place of Publishing: Boston Date of Publishing: 1898 Publisher: Houghton, Mifflin & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003645627 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
